pull_request.title: Add feature with baseline changes (table format)
pull_request.body:
## Summary

Adding new feature with type changes.

### CI Baseline 变更检查

- **关联 Issue**：#789
- **净增原因**：重构导致临时类型退化

**新增错误摘要**：

| 文件 | 错误类型 | 说明 |
|------|----------|------|
| `src/engram/gateway/foo.py` | [return] | Missing return type |
| `src/engram/logbook/bar.py` | [arg-type] | Argument mismatch |

## Related Issues

#789
